alert.note: Alert for Clay; Nuckolls (Nebraska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Hastings (North Central Kansas and South Central Nebraska)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 22 at 4:47PM CDT by NWS Hastings
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southeastern Clay and northeastern Nuckolls Counties through 515 PM CDT... At 447 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Edgar, or 25 miles southeast of Hastings, moving south at 30 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Davenport around 500 PM CDT. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 1100 PM CDT for south central Nebraska.
